item.title: J.S. (Jason) Liu
item.description: Hey! My name is J.S. (Jason) Liu, and I’m an environmental/development economics and computer science student at Williams College, expected to graduate in 2021. My pronouns are they/them but he/him are okay too. I’m interested in applying data science, economics, and public policy research to solving societal problems, from climate change to discrimination to global poverty and inequality. In the past, I’ve worked on research projects ranging from environmental regulation in California to agricultural policy in Sub-Saharan Africa.
